titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to R. C. Hewitt
CWG13920

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
56
Feby 14th 5
Dr R. C. Hewitt
Chrm Medl Board.
Louisville Ky.
Sir

I have the honor to request that your Board will examine Dr B. F Slaughter touching his qualifications for the position of Asst Surg, he having produced satisfactory evidence to this Dept of his loyalty and good standing.

By command of the Governor.
D, W, Lindsey
Inspt & Adj Genl Ky
